backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining Veda and mantra types with a custom comparator and a map containing sample Samaveda mantra translations.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report linking feature requirements to frontend source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend fileâ€™s purpose across hooks, components, scripts, and configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Mainnet deployment guide detailing prerequisites, identity setup, cycles, build steps, and verification.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes used across the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect rule routing all paths to index.html for SPA hosting.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page redirecting unknown paths to index.html while preserving the original URL as a query parameter.
frontend/README.md: Project overview with features, canister ID placeholders, template editor behavior, and tech stack notes.
frontend/scripts/build.sh: Build script performing a clean build, generating backend bindings, building frontend, and building canisters.
frontend/scripts/deploy-ic.sh: Mainnet deployment script with safety prompts, identity checks, deployment commands, and canister ID output.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling deep links, dropdown state, mantra fetching, template editor toggling, and page layout.
frontend/src/components/MantraAudioSecti: Provides audio playback and authenticated upload for mantra audio with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MantraContentTem: Loads, edits, validates, and submits mantra content templates while managing form state and clipboard copy.
frontend/src/components/MantraMetadataHe: Displays metadata text with styling applied to tokens ending in a colon.
frontend/src/components/ShareArea.tsx: Shows the current URL and allows users to copy it via a button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and persistence via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating mantra data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom light/dark theme variables and metadata label styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/selectValueGuards.ts: Provides helpers to validate select values and ensure they match available options, plus a bigint validity check.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, containers, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state, issues, and feature requests related to mantra dropdown visibility and the Add-button workflow.
